com.jrefinery.chart
Class Bar

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.jrefinery.chart.Bar
public class Bar
extends java.lang.Object

Represents all the visual characteristics of a single bar in a BarPlot.

See Also:
BarPlot

          A rectangle defining the area of the bar.
